name: Pizza With a Pulse
description:
Pizza With A Pulse is our entry for Ludam Dare #46. It is a fast paced and hectic pizza delivery simulation. Set during Dr. Badd’s alien invasion of earth the player must deliver the pizza, follow your orders, and who knows; you just might make it out alive!

CONTROLS

    - W,A,S,&D: Driving controls.
    - SHIFT: Brakes
    - Mouse Look: Controlling your right hand.
    - LMB: Pick up objects & interact.
    - RMB: Changes hand elevation.
    - E: Pumps heart (while holding it)
